## Bio

At Elucidata, our team leverages my expertise in computational biology and biotechnology, honed through a Master of Technology from Indraprastha Institute of Information Technology and a Master's in Biotechnology from Gautam Buddha University. Since joining in October 2022, we've applied my skills in Transcriptomics, Machine Learning and Python to advance our research, contributing to meaningful advancements in the field of bioinformatics. My core competencies lie in seamlessly integrating complex data analysis with biological insights to drive innovation and discovery in our ongoing projects.
